about.description: Wine is more than a passion for me, it is a life story in aroma, taste and emotion.

seo.title: About Yentl Quintelier | Private Sommelier Belgium
seo.description: Meet Yentl Quintelier, Sommelier of the Year Belgium 2022. Discover the story behind your private sommelier and his passion for wine.
seo.keywords: private sommelier, sommelier Belgium, Yentl Quintelier, sommelier of the year, wine expert

about.intro: Wine is more than a passion for me
about.paragraph1: I am Yentl Quintelier, sommelier with heart and soul. My journey began at a young age, with a dream of becoming a chef. However, during my training at Hotel School Stella Matutina, I discovered another world: that of wine. The finesse, the tradition, the story behind every bottle, it captivated me completely.
about.paragraph2: After specializing in restaurant management and beverage knowledge - awarded the prize for best student of the year - I gained experience at some of Belgium's finest restaurants: Hertog Jan, Le Château du Mylord, La Table de Maxime and Nuance, where I was responsible for wine pairing, hospitality and cellar management as a sommelier.
about.paragraph3: In 2022, I was named Sommelier of the Year Belgium, a recognition that has further fueled my passion.
about.paragraph4: Today I work as a freelance sommelier on an independent basis. I offer a wide range of services: from tastings and wine advice to the maintenance and management of private wine cellars. Whether it's a glass that perfectly complements a dish or a cellar that tells a story, I believe wine should always be an experience.
about.articleTitle: Yentl Quintelier: "I wanted to work in at least a two-star restaurant"
about.articleDescription: A glimpse into the L'Avenir article about Yentl Quintelier, one of the new sommeliers of the year. Read more about their passion for wine and their ambitions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Privacy Policy of Sommelier Quintelier - How we protect and use your personal data.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Sommelier Quintelier, established in Belgium and represented by Yentl Quintelier, places great importance on protecting your privacy. In this privacy policy, we explain what personal data we collect, why we collect it, and how we use it.

dataCollected.title: 3. What Data Do We Collect?
dataCollected.intro: We may collect the following personal data from you:

items.contact: Contact details (name, email address, phone number)
items.business: Business details (company name, VAT number if applicable)

purpose.title: 4. Why Do We Collect Your Data?
purpose.intro: We use your personal data for:

items.services: Providing our services (wine advice, tastings, subscriptions)
items.orders: Processing orders, payments, and recurring subscriptions
items.questions: Responding to your questions and requests

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: Right of access - You can request what data we hold about you
items.rectification: Right to rectification - You can request correction of incorrect data
items.erasure: Right to erasure - You can request deletion of your data
items.restriction: Right to restriction - You can request limitation of processing
items.objection: Right to object - You can object to the processing
items.portability: Right to data portability - You can receive your data in a structured format

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at info@yentlquintelier.com

security.title: 6. Security
security.content: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against loss, misuse, unauthorized access, and unwanted disclosure.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: Do you have questions about our privacy policy? Feel free to contact us.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.metaDescription: Terms and Conditions of Sommelier Quintelier for services and wine subscriptions.

scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.content: These terms and conditions apply to all services offered by Yentl Quintelier, operating under the name Sommelier Quintelier, established in Belgium. By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions.

items.consultancy: Wine advice and consultancy for individuals and businesses
items.wineList: Wine list creation and management for restaurants

orders.title: 3. Orders and Agreements
orders.content: An agreement is concluded when you place an order and we confirm it by email. All offers are non-binding unless otherwise stated. We reserve the right to refuse orders without giving reasons.

payment.title: 4. Prices and Payment
payment.content: All prices are in euros and include VAT unless otherwise stated. Payment must be made according to the payment method stated on the invoice and within the specified period. For wine subscriptions, payment is made via automatic direct debit through our payment provider Mollie.

duration.label: Duration and Renewal:
duration.content: Wine subscriptions are automatically renewed monthly unless otherwise agreed. Payment is made via automatic direct debit through Mollie.

cancellation.label: Cancellation:
cancellation.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellation can be done via the link in your order confirmation or by contacting info@yentlquintelier.com.

payment.label: Payment:
payment.content: The first monthly payment takes place when the subscription is concluded. Subsequent payments are automatically collected around the same date in the following months.

delivery.label: Delivery:
delivery.content: We strive to deliver monthly selections on time. Delays due to external factors cannot be attributed to us.

delivery.title: 6. Delivery and Shipping
delivery.content: Deliveries take place in Belgium. Delivery times are indicative and not binding. We are not liable for delays beyond our control.

withdrawal.title: 7. Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.content: Private customers have the right to withdraw from the agreement within 14 days of receiving the products, without giving reasons. Returns must be made in original condition and packaging.

liability.title: 8. Liability
liability.content: Our liability is limited to the invoice value of the services or products concerned. We are not liable for indirect damage, consequential damage or lost profits.
